mapper.select: select reservation.reservation_idx, shop.idx , shop.thumbnail, shop.title, shop.address, shop.phone, time.time_date, time.time_time from reservation left join time on reservation.time_idx = time.time_idx left join shop on time.shop_idx = shop.idx where reservation.user_idx=#{user_idx} and DATE(NOW()) <= time_date order by time_date asc;
select time_idx from reservation where reservation_idx=#{reservation_idx}
select reservation_idx from reservation where user_idx=#{user_idx}
